channel.title: About-rsses on Everyone Program: A free, self-paced, coached introduction to computer programming for people who know nothing about it.

item.title: About
item.description:
• Questions? Email Mindview LLC mindviewinc@gmail.com.

  • Images created by Macrovector - Freepik.com, and edited by Daniel Will-Harris.

  • Site built with Hugo, using a theme derived from Material.

  • Github Repo containing the source code for this site.

  • Hosted, with thanks, on Github Pages.
